About Me

I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Technical University of Denmark, specializing in Computational Statistics, Algorithmic Fairness, and Responsible AI. My research focuses on developing innovative methods to ensure fairness and transparency in machine learning systems.

With a PhD in Computational Statistics from the University of Ibadan and extensive teaching and research experience, I have published numerous papers and contributed to international projects, particularly in Africa.

Education
